title: Sawmill wants to go home
acceptText: Hello, I am Sawmill! I live in this rocket because of reasons. That is why it is called ''Sawmill Express''. But I have a problem, I can not start the rocket because I fucked up the start button. It is on the outside... Can you help me press the button? It only works if you first kill five zombies AND build a sandcastle. You're a wizard, Legolas! Now go!

title: The first one is free
acceptText: Hello Nollan! I am Rekoil, the Linux dealer here at IT. I will give you a 1GB USB stick with the finest Arch Linux in town, ready to be injected. Can you please visit Hubben and install Arch on all computers you can find?.
completionText: Thanks a lot! Here, be discrete... I don't want GUD to know I'm distributing lightweight distros around campus.

title: #NyaBjörn
acceptText: Hjälp mig att bli nya Björn
